rows.name: Stubborn
rows.description: Your devotion to Sigmar's cause is unshakable. Reduce Intelligence by 5.

rows.name: Hammer Bearer
rows.description: When wealding any type of Hammer weapon, you deal an extra 1 damage. However, you gain a -10 penalty to all Ballistic Skill tests.

rows.name: Suspicious
rows.description: You are ever vigilant against the Ruinous Powers. Take a -10 penalty to Fellowship Tests when meeting someone for the first time.

rows.name: Grudge Bearer
rows.description: You don't forgive easily. When fighting an opponent who has harmed you or an ally, take a -10 penalty to Intelligence Tests, bug tain a +10 bonus to Strength and Willpower Tests for the duration of the encounter.

rows.name: Sigmar's Mien
rows.description: Your hair lightens as your body bulks out and your eyes turn blue. gain 1d10/2 inches of height and 2d10 pounds of weight, and increase your Toughness by 5 (which may affect your Toughness Bonus).

rows.name: Dawongr ("Dwarf Friend")
rows.description: Your bearing invokes the ancient Dwarven promises to Sigmar. You gain a +10 bonus to Fellowship Tests when dealing with Dwarves.

rows.name: Greenskin Animosity
rows.description: You loathe goblins and their kind. You gain the Frenzy Talent which applies whenever you encounter goblinoids.

rows.name: Symbol of Unity
rows.description: You stoke pride in the Empire. The first time during an encounter a citizen of the Empire within 6 yards of you makes a Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill test against another Empire citizen, they take a -10 penalty.

rows.name: Enlightened
rows.description: You are filled with Sigmar's courage. When combating Greenskins or the servants of Chaos, you automatically pass Willpower tests.

rows.name: Marked by Sigmar
rows.description: A symbol of Sigmar appears as a mark somewhere on your body (roll 1d100 for Hit Location). You gain +10 bonus to Pray tests when using Miracles of Sigmar, and +10 bonus to Fellowship tests when dealing with other followers of Sigmar if they can see the mark.
